FuncDef: This command allows a sub second CCM enabled MEP to delay a transition to a failed state if a configured remote CCM peer has timed out. The MEP will remain in the UP state for 3.5 times CCM interval + down-delay.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the time, in centiseconds, used for the hold-timer for associated Continuity Check (CC) Session down event dampening. This guards against reporting excessive member operational state transitions. Values-0 to 1000. ParamDefault: Default- 0

Specifies the time, in deciseconds, used for the hold-timer for associated Continuity Check (CC) Session up event dampening. This guards against reporting excessive member operational state transitions. Values-0 to 5000. ParamDefault: Default- 20
